# NOTE: This file is generated by yotta: changes will be overwritten!

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8.11)

include_directories("/home/lunaixsky/Microbit/gesture-mouse/yotta_modules/mdl-gmouse/source")


set(YOTTA_AUTO_MDL-GMOUSE_CPP_FILES
    "/home/lunaixsky/Microbit/gesture-mouse/yotta_modules/mdl-gmouse/source/gesture.cpp"
    "/home/lunaixsky/Microbit/gesture-mouse/yotta_modules/mdl-gmouse/source/mdl_wire.cpp"
)
# force dependency on the config header for cpp files, which CMake otherwise wouldn't track:
set_property(SOURCE ${YOTTA_AUTO_MDL-GMOUSE_CPP_FILES} PROPERTY OBJECT_DEPENDS "/home/lunaixsky/Microbit/gesture-mouse/build/bbc-microbit-classic-gcc/yotta_config.h")


add_library(mdl-gmouse
    ${YOTTA_AUTO_MDL-GMOUSE_CPP_FILES}
)

yotta_postprocess_target(LIBRARY mdl-gmouse)



target_link_libraries(mdl-gmouse
    microbit
)
